Aelo/Celeno/Ocipite::

Aelo: If Megatron didn't betray you... Why are you alone with us?
Celeno Why have he left you alone a long time ago?
Ocipite: Why doesn't he care that you need cr due your hurts?

Aelo/Celeno/Ocipite: Why has he done that Scorponok?


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> 
> Scorponok Looks from one female to another to another then 
straightens up again
> Scorponok: "I am Scorponok, Preadacon Warrior, but died in the 
Beast Wars?
> I've never died. I do remember the last thing before you though, 
Megatron,
> Waspinator, Terrasaur and I were in this ship" as he says that he 
turns to
> see the ship that was shredded by Tigerhawk's arrival "but it wasnt 
in
> ruins, anyways Megatron had just finally finished of that slagging 
waste of
> fur Optimus Primal, and the alien planet smasher, when an incoming 
quantum
> surge knocke me into Terrasaur and into the lava" then thoughtfully
> Scorponok looks around " I had this strange felling in me as if I 
was
> changing, but I never died. As soon as I hit the lave I fell into 
stasis
> lock" Scorponok finishes triumphly, then as if he realizes 
something starts
> to get excited again " What was it you said about Megatron a 
traitor,
> Megatrons noble, he would not betray" Scorponok starts to ramble off
> incohirently to himself as he starts to walk around looking at the 
wreckage.
> 
> 
> >Sharpclaws/depfear/Charon/Underground/Aelo/Celeno/Ocipite::
> >
> >Hecate divided and Aelo, Celeno and Ocipite appeared again.
> >Perceptor's squad was ready to fight just incase. The three Ladies
> >walked in front of the males and stopped inf front of Scorponok and
> >said:
> >
> >Aelo/Celeno/Ocipite: we're Darkfate's warriors... Our master is a
